languages.text: "Благодарю за терпение, {name}. Вы помогаете мне видеть мир в совсем иных оттенках... Для меня это ново. А наши беседы находят особый отклик в моей душе. Теперь же — позвольте откланяться. Я возвращаюсь в свои покои, дабы обдумать сегодняшний разговор".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю за терпение, {name}. Вы помогаете мне видеть мир в совсем иных оттенках... Для меня это ново. А наши беседы находят особый отклик в моей душе. Теперь же — позвольте откланяться. Я возвращаюсь в свои покои, дабы обдумать сегодняшний разговор".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Thank you for your patience, {name}. You are helping me to see the world in different colours... a novel experience for me. Our conversations hold a special place in my heart. Allow me to bid you farewell for now. I am heading back to my chambers to consider today's conversation."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю за терпение, {name}. Вы помогаете мне видеть мир в совсем иных оттенках... Для меня это ново. А наши беседы находят особый отклик в моей душе. Теперь же — позвольте откланяться. Я возвращаюсь в свои покои, дабы обдумать сегодняшний разговор".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for the patience, {name}. You are helping me to see the world in different colors... Which is novel to me. Our conversations hold a special place in my soul. Allow me to bid you farewell for now. I am heading back to my chambers to consider our today's conversation."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for the patience, {name}. You are helping me to see the world in different colors... Which is novel to me. Our conversations hold a special place in my soul. Allow me to bid you farewell for now. I am heading back to my chambers to consider our today's conversation."

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your patience, {name}. You are helping me to see the world in different colours... a novel experience for me. Our conversations hold a special place in my heart. Allow me to bid you farewell for now. I am heading back to my chambers to consider today's conversation."

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your patience, {name}. You are helping me to see the world in different colours... a novel experience for me. Our conversations hold a special place in my heart. Allow me to bid you farewell for now. I am heading back to my chambers to consider today's conversation."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “谢谢你的耐心，{name}。你正在帮助我以新的色彩来看待这个世界……这对我而言是种新奇的体验。我们之间的谈话，会在我心中占有特别的一席之地。请允许我暂时向你告别，我要回房间思考今天的谈话。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your patience, {name}. You are helping me to see the world in different colours... a novel experience for me. Our conversations hold a special place in my heart. Allow me to bid you farewell for now. I am heading back to my chambers to consider today's conversation."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你的耐心，{name}。你正在帮助我以新的色彩来看待这个世界……这对我而言是种新奇的体验。我们之间的谈话，会在我心中占有特别的一席之地。请允许我暂时向你告别，我要回房间思考今天的谈话。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Gracias por su paciencia, {name}. Me ayuda a ver el mundo de otros colores... es una experiencia nueva para mí. Nuestras conversaciones son algo muy especial que guardo en mi corazón. Permítame que despida por ahora; debo volver a mis aposentos para meditar sobre nuestra conversación de hoy».
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your patience, {name}. You are helping me to see the world in different colours... a novel experience for me. Our conversations hold a special place in my heart. Allow me to bid you farewell for now. I am heading back to my chambers to consider today's conversation."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias por su paciencia, {name}. Me ayuda a ver el mundo de otros colores... es una experiencia nueva para mí. Nuestras conversaciones son algo muy especial que guardo en mi corazón. Permítame que despida por ahora; debo volver a mis aposentos para meditar sobre nuestra conversación de hoy».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「我慢していただいてありがとうございます、{name}様。{name}様のおかげで、世界をこれまでとは違う色で見ることができるようになりました。あたくしたちの会話は、心の中で特別な位置を占めています。それでは、これにて失礼させていただきます。自分の部屋に戻って、今日の会話について思い巡らせようと思いますので」
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your patience, {name}. You are helping me to see the world in different colours... a novel experience for me. Our conversations hold a special place in my heart. Allow me to bid you farewell for now. I am heading back to my chambers to consider today's conversation."

traits.locale_text: 「我慢していただいてありがとうございます、{name}様。{name}様のおかげで、世界をこれまでとは違う色で見ることができるようになりました。あたくしたちの会話は、心の中で特別な位置を占めています。それでは、これにて失礼させていただきます。自分の部屋に戻って、今日の会話について思い巡らせようと思いますので」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Danke für Eure Geduld, {name}. Ihr helft mir, die Welt in anderen Farben zu sehen ... für mich eine neue Erfahrung. Unsere Gespräche haben einen besonderen Platz in meinem Herzen. Gestattet bitte, dass ich mich nun verabschiede. Ich gehe zurück in mein Quartier und denke über die heutige Unterhaltung nach."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your patience, {name}. You are helping me to see the world in different colours... a novel experience for me. Our conversations hold a special place in my heart. Allow me to bid you farewell for now. I am heading back to my chambers to consider today's conversation."

traits.locale_text: "Danke für Eure Geduld, {name}. Ihr helft mir, die Welt in anderen Farben zu sehen ... für mich eine neue Erfahrung. Unsere Gespräche haben einen besonderen Platz in meinem Herzen. Gestattet bitte, dass ich mich nun verabschiede. Ich gehe zurück in mein Quartier und denke über die heutige Unterhaltung nach."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Merci de votre patience, {name}. Vous m'aidez à voir le monde sous d'autres couleurs... Une expérience pour le moins inédite, en ce qui me concerne. Bien que je chérisse nos conversations, permettez-moi de prendre congé. Je vais réfléchir à notre discussion du jour dans mes quartiers. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your patience, {name}. You are helping me to see the world in different colours... a novel experience for me. Our conversations hold a special place in my heart. Allow me to bid you farewell for now. I am heading back to my chambers to consider today's conversation."

traits.locale_text: « Merci de votre patience, {name}. Vous m'aidez à voir le monde sous d'autres couleurs... Une expérience pour le moins inédite, en ce qui me concerne. Bien que je chérisse nos conversations, permettez-moi de prendre congé. Je vais réfléchir à notre discussion du jour dans mes quartiers. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Sabrın için teşekkürler {name}. Dünyayı farklı renklerde görebilmeme yardımcı oluyorsun. Bu benim için çok değerli bir deneyim. Sohbetlerimiz kalbimde özel bir yere sahip ama şimdilik vedalaşalım. Bugünkü sohbetimizi değerlendirmek üzere odama çekiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your patience, {name}. You are helping me to see the world in different colours... a novel experience for me. Our conversations hold a special place in my heart. Allow me to bid you farewell for now. I am heading back to my chambers to consider today's conversation."

traits.locale_text: "Sabrettiğin için teşekkürler {name}. Dünyayı farklı renklerde görebilmeme yardımcı oluyorsun. Bu benim için çok değerli bir deneyim. Sohbetlerimiz kalbimde özel bir yere sahip ama şimdilik vedalaşalım. Bugünkü sohbetimizi değerlendirmek üzere odama çekiliyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
